title: Glen Echo Park: Information for Cyclists
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Know Before You Come     Information for Cyclists              Information for Cyclists          Cyclists who park in the Glen Echo Park visitor parking lot are asked to follow the following regulations:   Please use the restroom next to the carousel in the park. Please change clothes in the restroom building. When bringing groups of 10 or more, contact park headquarters (703-289-2500) about gaining a special use permit. Please park in the "dogleg", the section of the parking lot farthest away from MacArthur Blvd.   Thank you for your cooperation.
